item.title: Spectroscopy with PLDM
item.description: Computation of linear absorption spectra with standard and spin-based partially linearized densty matrix (PLDM) techniques.

item.title: Exciton dynamics with Spin-Mapping
item.description: A semiclassical approach to modelling relaxation dynamics in photoexcited polymer chains.

item.title: Hydrogen production with MOFs
item.description: Studying hydrogen production capacity of light-metal based MOFs.

item.title: Cavity QED systems for Qubits
item.description: Study of principles of quantum optics and recent cavity-based implementation of qubits.

item.title: Modelling Heavymetal Photocatalysis
item.description: Modelling rate of heavymetal purification from water by photocatalysis.

item.title: CO2 Capture with COFs
item.description: Gauging absorption of Carbon Dioxide on various organic precursors.

item.title: Study of Metal Organic Frameworks
item.description: Literary review of the structure, function and applications of metal-organic frameworks, focusing on the merits in CO2 capture
